00025 // main system configuration

00027 // start the session

00029 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/table/simbio_table.inc.php';

00033 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_FILE/simbio_directory.inc.php';
00034 
00035 // page title
00036 $page_title = 'File Attachment Upload';
00037 // check for biblio ID in url
00038 $biblioID = 0;
00039 if (isset($_GET['biblioID']) AND $_GET['biblioID']) {
00040     $biblioID = (integer)$_GET['biblioID'];
00041 }
00042 // check for file ID in url
00043 $fileID = 0;
00044 if (isset($_GET['fileID']) AND $_GET['fileID']) {
00045     $fileID = (integer)$_GET['fileID'];

00048 // start the output buffer
00049 ob_start();
00050 /* main content */
00051 // biblio topic save proccess
00052 if (isset($_POST['upload']) AND trim(strip_tags($_POST['fileTitle'])) != '') {
00053     $uploaded_file_id = 0;
00054     $title = trim(strip_tags($_POST['fileTitle']));
00055     $url = trim(strip_tags($_POST['fileURL']));
00056     // create new sql op object
00057     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00058     // FILE UPLOADING
00059     if (isset($_FILES['file2attach']) AND $_FILES['file2attach']['size']) {
00060         // create upload object
00061         $file_dir = trim($_POST['fileDir']);
00062         $file_upload = new simbio_file_upload();
00063         $file_upload->setAllowableFormat($sysconf['allowed_file_att']);
00064         $file_upload->setMaxSize($sysconf['max_upload']*1024);
00065         $file_upload->setUploadDir(REPO_BASE_DIR.DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR.str_replace('/', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR, $file_dir));
00066         $file_upload_status = $file_upload->doUpload('file2attach');
00067         if ($file_upload_status === UPLOAD_SUCCESS) {
00068             $file_ext = substr($file_upload->new_filename, strrpos($file_upload->new_filename, '.')+1);
00069             $fdata['uploader_id'] = $_SESSION['uid'];
00070             $fdata['file_title'] = $dbs->escape_string($title);
00071             $fdata['file_name'] = $dbs->escape_string($file_upload->new_filename);
00072             $fdata['file_url'] = $dbs->escape_string($url);
00073             $fdata['file_dir'] = $dbs->escape_string($file_dir);
00074             $fdata['file_desc'] = $dbs->escape_string(trim(strip_tags($_POST['fileDesc'])));
00075             $fdata['mime_type'] = $sysconf['mimetype'][$file_ext];
00076             $fdata['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00077             $fdata['last_update'] = $fdata['input_date'];
00078             // insert file data to database
00079             @$sql_op->insert('files', $fdata);
00080             $uploaded_file_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00081             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' upload file ('.$file_upload->new_filename.')');
00082         } else {
00083             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00084             echo 'alert(\''.__('Upload FAILED! Forbidden file type or file size too big!').'\');';
00085             echo 'self.close();';
00086             echo '</script>';
00087             die();
00088         }
00089     } else {
00090         if ($url && preg_match('@^(http|https|ftp|gopher):\/\/@i', $url)) {
00091             $fdata['uploader_id'] = $_SESSION['uid'];
00092             $fdata['file_title'] = $dbs->escape_string($title);
00093             $fdata['file_name'] = $dbs->escape_string($url);
00094             $fdata['file_url'] = $fdata['file_name'];
00095             $fdata['file_dir'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00096             $fdata['file_desc'] = $dbs->escape_string(trim(strip_tags($_POST['fileDesc'])));
00097             $fdata['mime_type'] = 'text/uri-list';
00098             $fdata['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d H:i:s');
00099             $fdata['last_update'] = $fdata['input_date'];
00100             // insert file data to database
00101             @$sql_op->insert('files', $fdata);
00102             $uploaded_file_id = $sql_op->insert_id;
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     // BIBLIO FILE RELATION DATA UPDATE
00107     // check if biblio_id POST var exists
00108     if (isset($_POST['updateBiblioID']) AND !empty($_POST['updateBiblioID'])) {
00109         $updateBiblioID = (integer)$_POST['updateBiblioID'];
00110         $data['biblio_id'] = $updateBiblioID;
00111         $data['file_id'] = $uploaded_file_id;
00112         $data['access_type'] = trim($_POST['accessType']);
00113         $data['access_limit'] = 'literal{NULL}';
00114         // parsing member type data
00115         if ($data['access_type'] == 'public') {
00116             $groups = '';
00117             if (isset($_POST['accLimit']) AND count($_POST['accLimit']) > 0) {
00118                 $groups = serialize($_POST['accLimit']);
00119             } else {
00120                 $groups = 'literal{NULL}';
00121             }
00122             $data['access_limit'] = trim($groups);
00123         }
00124 
00125         if (isset($_POST['updateFileID'])) {
00126             $fileID = (integer)$_POST['updateFileID'];
00127             // file biblio access update
00128             $update1 = $sql_op->update('biblio_attachment', array('access_type' => $data['access_type'], 'access_limit' => $data['access_limit']), 'biblio_id='.$updateBiblioID.' AND file_id='.$fileID);
00129             // file description update
00130             $update2 = $sql_op->update('files', array('file_title' => $title, 'file_url' => $url, 'file_desc' => $dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['fileDesc']))), 'file_id='.$fileID);
00131             if ($update1) {
00132                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00133                 echo 'alert(\''.__('File Attachment data updated!').'\');';
00134                 echo 'opener.location.href = \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_attach.php?biblioID='.$updateBiblioID.'\';';
00135                 echo '</script>';
00136             } else {
00137                 utility::jsAlert(''.__('File Attachment data FAILED to update!').''."\n".$sql_op->error);
00138             }
00139         } else {
00140             if ($sql_op->insert('biblio_attachment', $data)) {
00141                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00142                 echo 'alert(\''.__('File Attachment uploaded succesfully!').'\');';
00143                 echo 'opener.setIframeContent(\'attachIframe\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_attach.php?biblioID='.$data['biblio_id'].'\');';
00144                 echo '</script>';
00145             } else {
00146                 utility::jsAlert(''.__('File Attachment data FAILED to save!').''."\n".$sql_op->error);
00147             }
00148         }
00149         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'bibliography', $_SESSION['realname'].' updating file attachment data');
00150     } else {
00151         if ($uploaded_file_id) {
00152             // add to session array
00153             $fdata['file_id'] = $uploaded_file_id;
00154             $fdata['access_type'] = trim($_POST['accessType']);
00155             $_SESSION['biblioAttach'][$uploaded_file_id] = $fdata;
00156             echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00157             echo 'alert(\''.__('File Attachment uploaded succesfully!').'\');';
00158             echo 'opener.setIframeContent(\'attachIframe\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'bibliography/iframe_attach.php\');';
00159             echo '</script>';
00160         }
00161     }
00162 }
00163 
00164 // create new instance
00165 $form = new simbio_form_table('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?biblioID='.$biblioID, 'post');
00166 $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="upload" value="'.__('Upload Now').'" class="button"';
00167 // form table attributes
00168 $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00169 $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00170 $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00171 
00172 // query
00173 $file_attach_q = $dbs->query("SELECT fl.*, batt.* FROM files AS fl
00174     LEFT JOIN biblio_attachment AS batt ON fl.file_id=batt.file_id
00175     WHERE batt.biblio_id=$biblioID AND batt.file_id=$fileID");
00176 $file_attach_d = $file_attach_q->fetch_assoc();
00177 
00178 // edit mode
00179 if ($file_attach_d['biblio_id'] AND $file_attach_d['file_id']) {
00180     $form->addHidden('updateBiblioID', $file_attach_d['biblio_id']);
00181     $form->addHidden('updateFileID', $file_attach_d['file_id']);
00182 } else if ($biblioID) {
00183     $form->addHidden('updateBiblioID', $biblioID);
00184 }
00185 
00186 // file title
00187 $form->addTextField('text', 'fileTitle', __('Title'), $file_attach_d['file_title'], 'style="width: 100%; overflow: auto;"');
00188 // file attachment
00189 if ($file_attach_d['file_name']) {
00190     $form->addAnything('Attachment', $file_attach_d['file_dir'].'/'.$file_attach_d['file_name']);
00191 } else {
00192     // file upload dir
00193     // create simbio directory object
00194     $repo = new simbio_directory(REPO_BASE_DIR);
00195     $repo_dir_tree = $repo->getDirectoryTree(5);
00196     $repodir_options[] = array('', __('Repository ROOT'));
00197     if (is_array($repo_dir_tree)) {
00198         // sort array by index
00199         ksort($repo_dir_tree);
00200         // loop array
00201         foreach ($repo_dir_tree as $dir) {
00202             $repodir_options[] = array($dir, $dir);
00203         }
00204     }
00205     // add repo directory options to select list
00206     $form->addSelectList('fileDir', __('Repo. Directory'), $repodir_options);
00207     // file upload
00208     $str_input = simbio_form_element::textField('file', 'file2attach');
00209     $str_input .= ' Maximum '.$sysconf['max_upload'].' KB';
00210     $form->addAnything(__('File To Attach'), $str_input);
00211 }
00212 // file url
00213 $form->addTextField('textarea', 'fileURL', __('URL'), $file_attach_d['file_url'], 'rows="1" style="width: 100%; overflow: auto;"');
00214 // file description
00215 $form->addTextField('textarea', 'fileDesc', __('Description'), $file_attach_d['file_desc'], 'rows="2" style="width: 100%; overflow: auto;"');
00216 // file access
00217 $acctype_options[] = array('public', __('Public'));
00218 $acctype_options[] = array('private', __('Private'));
00219 $form->addSelectList('accessType', __('Access'), $acctype_options, $file_attach_d['access_type']);
00220 // file access limit if set to public
00221 $group_query = $dbs->query('SELECT member_type_id, member_type_name FROM mst_member_type');
00222 $group_options = array();
00223 while ($group_data = $group_query->fetch_row()) {
00224     $group_options[] = array($group_data[0], $group_data[1]);
00225 }
00226 $form->addCheckBox('accLimit', __('Access Limit by Member Type'), $group_options, !empty($file_attach_d['access_limit'])?unserialize($file_attach_d['access_limit']):null );
00227 
00228 // print out the object
00229 echo $form->printOut();
00230 
00231 /* main content end */
00232 $content = ob_get_clean();
00233 // include the page template
00234 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/notemplate_page_tpl.php';
